title: Official Statement of Air India Flight AI171
content:
Official Statement

Regarding the Incident Involving Air India Flight AI171*

We are deeply shocked and saddened by the tragic accident involving Air India Flight AI171. On behalf of our entire organization, we extend our sincerest condolences to the families and loved ones of the passengers and crew members affected by this heartbreaking event.

Our thoughts are with all those impacted by this tragedy. We stand in solidarity with Air India and the wider aviation community during this profoundly difficult time.
